feed.title: Fintunes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fintunes: v2.4.0
entry.content:
The karaoke release ðŸŽ¤

Fintunes now supports displaying lyrics so you can sign along to your favourite tunes! Also, you can now use Fintunes as a client for Emby. Minor features in this release include: * Cover images being saved for downloaded tracks (re-download your tracks to make sure they appear) * A display that shows codec information for your currently playing tracks * Loads of new translations!

Thanks for using Fintunes as always, and get in touch if you run into any issues!

What's Changed

  • chore: Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/197
  • Lyrics implementation prototype by @akrv7591 in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/224
  • feat: Media stream info in now playing modal by @leinelissen in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/233
  • chore: Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/232
  • chore: Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/235
  • feat: Emby support by @leinelissen in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/234
  • chore: Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/236
  • chore: Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/237
  • chore: Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/266

New Contributors

  • @akrv7591 made their first contribution in https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/pull/224

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/compare/v2.3.3...v2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Fintunes: v2.4.2
entry.content:
This is a minor bug fix release that addresses an issue where tracks without cover art produced an error when downloaded.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/compare/v2.4.1...v2.4.2

entry.title: New release for Fintunes: v2.4.3
entry.content: This addresses an issue on Android where the app would crash on the Now Playing overlay.

entry.title: New release for Fintunes: v2.4.4
entry.content:
This fixes an issue on Android, causing the application to reset every launch.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/compare/v2.4.3...v2.4.4

entry.title: New release for Fintunes: v2.4.5
entry.content:
This version fixes an issue where Fintunes was only able to play back the first disc in a multi-disc album. Also, thanks to our amazing language contributors, Fintunes is now available in Tamil. Additionally, there's 12 languages that have been updated. Enjoy this new version of Fintunes and consider joining our Discord server!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leinelissen/jellyfin-audio-player/compare/v2.4.4...v2.4.5
